Headline: #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and # 151 Sheridan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Roscoe/Aldine
ShortDescription: Southbound 146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Inner Lake Shore Dr, Addison, Broadway, Sheridan and Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and # 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Inner Lake Shore Dr, Addison, Broadway, Sheridan and Belmont due to street blockage near Roscoe/Aldine

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound and Linden Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound and Linden Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier signal problems near Thorndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound and Linden Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier signal problems near Thorndale.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.


Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Reroute at 95th/Troy
ShortDescription: 53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 95th, Kedzie, 83rd and Pulaski : due to, street blockage near 95th/Troy.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 95th, Kedzie, 83rd and Pulaski : due to, street blockage near 95th/Troy.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop- bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop- bound Brown  Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Merchandise Mart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop- bound Brown  Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Merchandise Mart.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
